Bitola.country: Macedonia, the Former Yugoslav Republic of

reviews.text: Nice view from shirok sokak

Yeni Mosque in Bitola is located in the city center on the right side of the River Dragor near the Clock Tower.
The mosque was built by Kadi Mahmud Effendi, but in Bitola is known as the Yeni (Turkish for  - New) Mosque.
It was built in 1558-59. The base of the mosque is square, covered with a dome.
Next to the mosque is a minaret, which reaches a height of over 40 m.
Until recently the premises of the mosque were used as art gallery, and later started archaeological research that showed that the mosque was built on the foundations of the old church of St. George, which existed at that place.
This was a church before the Turks turned it into a mosque. Today is an art gallery, a great site for a quick look.
very old mosque must to visit
Exactly tita
Perfect. Historical.

Balıkesir Saat Kulesi - Balıkesir

Saat Kulesi 1829 yılında Girit’li Mehmet Paşa tarafından İstanbul Galata Kulesi’nin benzeri olarak silindir şeklinde yaptırılmış idi. 1897 yılındaki deprem nedeniyle yıkılınca, 1901 yılında bugünkü şekliyle yeniden yaptırılmıştır. Kare prizma şeklindeki bina, beyaz kesme taş ile yapılmış ve kabartma işçiliklerle de süslü hale getirilmiştir.En üst kat kubbe ile örtülmüş ve büyük bir çan eklenmiştir. Buranın hemen altındaki katta ise dört yöne de birer saat konmuştur.

Bu kadar değerli bir eserin bu kadar biçimsiz bir noktada kalması kötü olmuş. Kuleyi yapanlar ileriyi görememişler. Kilise çanı benzeri her saat başı çalması müslüman mahallesinde salyangoza benziyor bu ses değişmeli
Şehire ayrı bir hava katan mimari yapı. Ne zaman çan başlasa içimden pink floyd high hopes mırıldanmama sebep oluyor..o nedenle ayrı seviyorum.
Kültürel mirasımızın emanet ettiği güzel yapılardan birisi

Wonderful building located at Magnolia Square in Bitola. On the right of the Russian Consulate is located beautiful neoclassical building which durring the period of the Ottoman Empire (opened in 1893), had been Salonika Bank (it has been found letters on arabic alphabet SELANIK AKBARE BANKASI)
Sunnyside is an amazing park, I was there for the Coca Cola Classic Disc Golf Tournament. Awesome weekend.
Loved the park with the rolling hills and trees. Had a wonderful firepit and frisbee golf
Nice relaxing place to picnic or just chill and listen to nature.
Nice quiet place to camp without the noise. Secluded and safe
Nice playground equipment, lots of shade trees, not much traffic. Nice place to have a picnic and play.

ヾ(＠⌒▽⌒＠)ﾉ lovely. I had breakfast here with my mom. Take time to just enjoy. Their was one waiter and it was busy. He was fantastic answered questions for us. I am American so I was not familiar with the menu. Will definitely come back when I am in town again.
The pizzas are really good here

The best lasagna in town for a long time, now.
Very cozy place too and friendly staff.
Delicious food, and good service. Definitely would go back.

Great service and the staff is always in a good mood positive and happy to help. Waiting time for meals usually is 20-30 minutes which is AWESOME. In my opinion positive waiters make for the best experience which is the case with this restraunt. The great food also helps :) one small remark is sometimes when I order food to be deliver they forget sauce and napkins but it's not a deal breaker for me I just make sure to tell them to please make sure they add it. Other then that for me this is a 5 star place. Descent prices and great service and happy staff.
Beatiful ambient, the best cheese in oven in town. Very affordable

The space is tight,  but the pizzas are good,  quality food. Prices are expected for a place in the center and actually cheap. Other then the fact that the sitting might feel constricted it I a great place.
It is mostly  pizza  place.It is lovely  to seat outside.The place is in the centre. Serves  was good.
If you like to eat the best pizza in Bitola, you must try in pizza Bure :)
The best sirenje vo furna
My favorite cafe in town: not often busy, the coffee is good, staff is super friendly, and they've got great pie.
Bad Pizza and unpolite waiter
Good coffee, amazing music, and kind waiters. Never had an issue here.
Nice place to stop for a drink.
A modern concept.

The owners are very helpful and nice. We got what we expected - the price was really good as well as the location. Our room even had a huge balcony overlooking the sea! We've spent a pleasant and relaxing night here. Unfortunately the owners don't speak English.
Basic hotel, good if you need to spend A night!
Old fashioned, be a tourists as they were 40 years ago. The place is beautifull un a Wes Anderson sense, but a dirty common bath kind of ruins the experience.
Old style room, dirty bathroom
Bellisimo
